name: Expense
description: An expense managing application to make life more easier and free.

SYNCHRONIZER_RECEIVING_EMAIL_HOST.description: The email host for synchronizers to receive emails. For example, "sync.exp.dev" stands for {syncer-uid}@sync.exp.dev.

ADMIN_USERNAME.description: The admin username for logging in the administration panel.

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: The admin password for logging in the administration panel.

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: The API key to access Google services (Google Maps Geocoding API and Google Maps Time Zone API). Get a new one on https://console.developers.google.com/apis.

MAILER_SENDER.description: The default email "from:" address for emails send by this app.

NEWRELIC_LICENSE_KEY.description: The New Relic license key for monitoring this app.

NEWRELIC_APP_NAME.description: The New Relic app name for monitoring this app.

LOGGER.description: The logger to use, this can be "default", "stdout", "syslog" or "remote".

SYNCER_PASSCODE_ENCRYPT_PUBLIC_KEY.description: The public RSA key for encrypting passcodes. (Run `bin/rake passcode_key` under the project to generate new keys.)

SYNCER_PASSCODE_ENCRYPT_PRIVATE_KEY_1.description: Part 1 of the private RSA key for encrypting passcodes.

SYNCER_PASSCODE_ENCRYPT_PRIVATE_KEY_2.description: Part 2 of the private RSA key for encrypting passcodes.

SYNCER_PASSCODE_ENCRYPT_PRIVATE_KEY_3.description: Part 3 of the private RSA key for encrypting passcodes.

SYNCER_PASSCODE_ENCRYPT_PRIVATE_KEY_4.description: Part 4 of the private RSA key for encrypting passcodes.

STAGING.description: Specify that this is a staging server on heroku. Clear this if it is not.
